msItemStruct.note: Number 5 in Stefanski's and Lichtheim's publication. Undated. Measurements not available. All ostraca in this volume were on loan from the Egyptian government and had been returned to Egypt by the time of publication.

condition.ab: On brown ribbed pottery with traces of black pitch coating inside

(23) This is the list of (24) my father's chattels. (Second column) (1) Those which have been given (2) to Sabek: (3) Three dyed dresses, (5) two cloaks, (6) two napkins, (7) eight ---, (8) one pillow, (9) one sheepskin, (10) eight garments, (11) one frying pan, (12) one ---, (13) one censer, (14) one image of bronze, (15) one candlestick.
